'''Radiant Spincrystal 122''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Into the Yonder and Water]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on a floating rock on near the top of [[Mt. Xuanlian]] in [[Chenyu Vale]], [[Liyue]].
